member.name: M:HAL.McNeel.Grasshopper1.Components.Motion.JointTarget.#ctor(HAL.McNeel.Grasshopper1.Components.Motion.JointTarget@,System.String,HAL.Objects.Mechanisms.Mechanism,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double},HAL.Motion.Settings.Target@)
member.param: Position of the mechanism joints is SI units: radians for revolute joints, meters for prismatic joints.
Reference on which resulting target will be based on.
Whether the frame specifies an absolute world location. If false, the frame is considered relative to the parent.
Curve described by the resulting targets.
Guide (Point, Vector, Plane, Curve, Surface, Brep or Mesh) to follow.
If a guide geometry is specified, target axis following the guide geometry.
If a guide geometry is specified, whether the inverse direction of the axis should be used.

member.summary: Modifies the orientation of a target.
